comment.author: 74891768@N00
comment._content: That's Piccadilly Arcade at the south end of Piccadilly.

comment.author: 27791616@N00
comment._content: The bus nearest the camera, with 'General' as a fleetname, is an AEC, not a Leyland.  It is likely that all the covered-top buses visible here are NSs, actually.

comment.author: 52686936@N08
comment._content: Interesting to note how many of the companies advertising on the buses are still in business today.
